description: A CS50 Visual Studio Code extension

debug50.disposeDebugTerminals.description: Dispose debug terminal when debug session ends.

viewsWelcome.contents:
Configure Display Language:
[Language Settings üåê](command:workbench.action.configureLocale)
Launch noVNC client to view your GUI program:
[GUI](command:cs50.launchGUI)
Reset your terminal if it doesn't look right:
[Reset Terminal](command:cs50.resetTerminal)
Update, rebuild, or full rebuild your Codespace:
[Update Codespace](command:cs50.updateCodespace)
[Rebuild Codespace](command:github.codespaces.rebuildEnvironment)
[Full Rebuild Codespace](command:github.codespaces.fullRebuildEnvironment)
Sync all changes to your backing repository forcefully via 'git push --force'.
Only if you feel it necessary to force sync your current changes to your remote repository:
[Force Sync Changes](command:cs50.syncChanges)
If your Codespace has stopped syncing with its backing repository due to git operation errors (e.g., files larger than 100M were added to commit history), you may want to perform a repository cleanup.
[WARNING] Make sure you have a backup of your important files before using this tool:
[Cleanup Repository](command:cs50.cleanupRepository)
